file_content.text: Not doing nothing. Just standing here.
Wentell, up in the fort. Trust me.
Hey, handsome man. Looks like you're new in these parts.
Hello, pretty girl. New in town?
Ord Mantell's a dangerous place. Plenty of bad people doing bad things.
Also a fine place to learn new tricks, get good at your game. If you know the right people.
I wouldn't mind meeting some like-minded individuals--to maybe discuss some wholly legitimate business practices?
Good, good. Learning the lay of the land is all important, yes?
I assume you can point me to these "right people"? Maybe for a small fee?
Do you know the right people?
No fee. Friendly advice. First one's free, yes?
Whatever you're selling, I don't need.
Not selling, just advising. Listen to the locals, yes?
You go see Wentell in Fort Garnik. He will make sure you learn what you need to know. Trust me.
You come back when you're older, yes?
